DOC.brief_summary: A Phase 2 study SEP-225289 adult attention deficit hyperactivity disorder ( ADHD ) .
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 2 , randomize , double-blind , parallel-group , multicenter , outpatient study evaluate efficacy safety SEP 225289 adult ADHD use 2 oral dosage ( 4 8 mg SEP 225289 daily [ QD ] ) versus placebo 4 week treatment period .
